MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Synchronize() cil managed

summary.span: Sincroniza o cursor e a interface do usuário.

span.span: Synchronizes the cursor and the user interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Aplicativos talvez seja necessário localizar o elemento que o cursor estiver posicionado sobre.Applications may need to locate the element that the cursor is positioned over. Se o aplicativo usa a animação, a método pode retornar um elemento que foi removido do cursor.If the application uses animation, the method might return an element that has moved out from under the cursor. Chamar para certificar-se de que retorna o elemento adequado.Call to be sure that returns the proper element. ## Examples O exemplo a seguir demonstra como retornar um elemento que está sob o cursor.The following example demonstrates how to return an element that is under the cursor. Chamando garante que retorna o elemento correto.Calling ensures that returns the correct element. [!code-csharp[StylusSamples#24](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/CSharp/Window2.xaml.cs#24)] [!code-vb[StylusSamples#24](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/VisualBasic/Window2.xaml.vb#24)] [!code-csharp[StylusSamples#26](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/CSharp/Window2.xaml.cs#26)] [!code-vb[StylusSamples#26](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/VisualBasic/Window2.xaml.vb#26)]
